recipe.name: Chicken with Crispy Holy Basil Leaves
recipe.instructions:
MIX the chicken, garlic, chillies, fish sauce and oyster sauce in a bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
HEAT 2 inches oil in a wok or deep frying pan over a medium heat When the oil seems hot, drop a few basil leaves into it. If they sizzle immediately. the oil is ready. Deep-fry three-quarters of the basil leaves for 1 minute or until they are all crispy. Lift out with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels. Discard the remaining oil.
HEAT 2 tablespoons oil in the same wok or frying pan and stir-fry half the chicken over a high heat for 3 to 4 minutes. Remove from the pan and repeat with the remaining chicken. Return all the chicken to the wok.
ADD the stock and sugar to the wok, then the red bell pepper and onion, and stir-fry for another 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the fresh basil leaves. Taste, then adjust the seasoning if necessary. Garnish with the crispy basil leaves.

ingredient.ingredientName: skinless chicken breast fillets, thinly sliced
small red or green bird's eye chillies, lightly crushed
vegetable or chicken stock, or water
red bell pepper, cut into bite-sized pieces
medium onion, cut into thin wedges
